additionalProperty.name: Ingredients
additionalProperty.value: Water (77%), Reconstituted Juice [Apple (20%), Strawberry (1.0%), Blueberry (0.5%), Raspberry (0.5%)], Natural Flavours (Contain Steviol Glycosides), Food Acids (Malic Acid, Ascorbic Acid), Natural Colour (Anthocyanin), Stabiliser (466).

additionalProperty.name: Dietary
additionalProperty.value: Low in Sugar, No Preservatives, No Artificial Flavours or Colours

description: Golden Circle Refreshers Berry Burst Flavoured Water Drink
